summary: DT: THE CONTACT RECEIVED RECALL 03V527000 IN 2-04 REGARDING THE POWER STEERING LOWER PINION BEARING.  HE TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER ON 2-17-04 FOR  RECALL REPAIRS. THE CAR HAD 56,000 MILES ON IT. AFTER THE RECALL REPAIR WORK WAS DONE, THE CONSUMER HEARD A NOISE IN THE POWER STEERING.  ON 5-9-05 THEY DISCOVERED A LEAK IN THE POWER STEERING. THEY REPLACED A POWER STEERING HOSE . THEN, AT 64,000 MILES, HE HEARD A HUMMING NOISE, THEY RE-ROUTED THE HOSE, AND TOLD HIM THE NOISE WOULD GO AWAY. ON 6-02-05 HE TOOK VEHICLE  BACK BECAUSE THE NOISE WAS STILL THERE. THEY TOLD HIM HE NEEDED A WHOLE NEW POWER STGEERING  UNIT. THE CONSUMER STATED THAT EVER SINCE HE HAD THE RECALL REPAIR WORK DONE, WHEN HE TURNED THE STEERING WHEEL TO THE RIGHT THERE WAS A LOUD HUMMING NOISE.  IT SEEMED TO BE COMING FROM THE LEFT SIDE.*AK   *JB
